name: Horror Level Showcase
description:
This was an assignment submission for a level design class I took in the Spring 2023 semester. It was built entirely in Unreal Engine 5.1, using the Modular Sci-Fi Season 2 Bundle on the Unreal Marketplace.

I wanted to practice level design using more horror elements in the environment. If I were to continue developing this project, I'd like to include more puzzle mechanics and rooms to explore. In this project's current state, however, it is only experimentation on horror-level design and audio implementation in Unreal Engine.

If you want to check out the blueprints, here's the link!
